record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1918. Fifth row: A. A. Stagg (coach); fourth row: T. Eck, J. M. Nicely, H. K. Buchman, F. A. Long, and N. B. Johnson; third row: H. W. Kennedy, H. D. Grossman, G. C. Lewis, and P. Grossman; second row: V. M. Ames, D. H. Annan, F. Firestone (captain), H. H. McCosh, and E. H. Moore; first row: C. C. Greene and S. H. Speer.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
